Nightlight/Windlord/Termitron/Trinity::

Nighlight looked to the screen and she wasn't sure what to say or do. 
Trinity arrived to control room, followed by Termitron. The little 
Chivtron looked to all Chivtrons said "What happened?? are the bad 
guys there outside???? "

***********

Windlord woke up and left Cr, he felt better and he wanted to know 
what's going outside and what happened with his fellows Chivtrons. He 
walked towards the control room
